findings.message:
Reentrancy in Pool.mint(uint256) (Pool.sol#1942-1959):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(dai.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),daiOffered)) (Pool.sol#1953)
	- require(bool)(yDai.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),yDaiRequired)) (Pool.sol#1954)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _mint(msg.sender,tokensMinted) (Pool.sol#1955)
		- _totalSupply = _totalSupply.add(amount) (Pool.sol#535)
	ERC20._totalSupply (Pool.sol#342) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- ERC20._burn(address,uint256) (Pool.sol#551-559)
	- ERC20._mint(address,uint256) (Pool.sol#530-538)
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (Pool.sol#398-400)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in Pool.init(uint128) (Pool.sol#1924-1936):
	External calls:
	- dai.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),daiIn) (Pool.sol#1933)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _mint(msg.sender,daiIn) (Pool.sol#1934)
		- _totalSupply = _totalSupply.add(amount) (Pool.sol#535)
	ERC20._totalSupply (Pool.sol#342) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- ERC20._burn(address,uint256) (Pool.sol#551-559)
	- ERC20._mint(address,uint256) (Pool.sol#530-538)
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (Pool.sol#398-400)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in Pool.buyYDai(address,address,uint128) (Pool.sol#2114-2126):
	External calls:
	- dai.transferFrom(from,address(this),daiIn) (Pool.sol#2121)
	- yDai.transfer(to,yDaiOut) (Pool.sol#2122)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Trade(maturity,from,to,- toInt256(daiIn),toInt256(yDaiOut)) (Pool.sol#2123)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

Reentrancy in Pool.burn(uint256) (Pool.sol#1965-1982):

	- yDai.transfer(msg.sender,yDaiReturned) (Pool.sol#1978)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
